snippet: At least 26 people died and as many as 600 people were missing after a huge mudslide near Guatemala City.
abstract: Authorities in Guatemala report 25 people dead and possibly 600 missing after heavy rains loosen a torrent of boulders and mud, submerging dozens of structures in town near Guatemala City.
lead_paragraph: At least 26 people died and as many as 600 people were missing after a huge mudslide near Guatemala City.

headline.main: Guatemala: Hundreds Are Missing After Mudslide
headline.print_headline: Latin America; Guatemala: Hundreds Are Missing After Mudslide
